game.name: PAYDAY 2: Tailor Pack 1
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Payday 2 is getting its first Tailor Pack to celebrate the new outfits system in the game. Tailor Pack 1 adds four new thematic suits with five color variations for each one - for a total of 20 new outfits!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Payday 2 is getting its first Tailor Pack to celebrate the new outfits system in the game. Tailor Pack 1 adds four new thematic suits with five color variations for each one - for a total of 20 new outfits!
